name: IoCStats
description: Information about the threat intelligence source. These fields are used to model Mandiant sources.

children.name: benign_count
children.description: Count of responses where the IoC was identified as benign.

children.name: first_level_source
children.description: Name of first level IoC source, for example Mandiant or a third-party.

children.name: ioc_stats_type
children.description: Describes the source of the IoCStat.

children.name: malicious_count
children.description: Count of responses where the IoC was identified as malicious.

children.name: quality
children.description: Level of confidence in the IoC mapping extracted from the source.

children.name: response_count
children.description: Total number of response from the source.

children.name: second_level_source
children.description: Name of the second-level IoC source, for example Crowdsourced Threat Analysis or Knowledge Graph.

children.name: source_count
children.description: Number of sources from which information was extracted.
